tab1.title: Characters
tab1.paragraph: Keep a character sheet for each one you have, keep the lore of your story as a separate universe .

tab2.title: Timeline
tab2.paragraph: Do not lose track of your dates or important knots, forget about the original failures and have a timeline as support .

tab3.title: Notes & Inspiration
tab3.paragraph: Keep all the notes and inspirations that come to mind at hand, complement your work with dates, data and relevant facts that you can then integrate as you see fit.

tab4.title: And much more...
tab4.paragraph: Everything you need to create a robust work, the next great story is in your mind.
